refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: syslog generates a log message that will be distributed by the system logger. priority is a combination of the facility and the level, values for which are given in the next section. The remaining argument is the message to send, except that the two characters %m will be replaced by the error message string (strerror) corresponding to the present value of errno.
On Windows NT, the syslog service is emulated using the Event Log.

note.para: Use of LOG_LOCAL0 through LOG_LOCAL7 for the facility parameter of openlog is not available in Windows.

refsect1.para: See also define_syslog_variables, openlog and closelog.
